name: Alexus

topics.response_text: A tribe called the Great Khans has joined us. They'd better be good fighters.

topics.topic_text: I want one of their heads.

description:
Decanus Alexus is a 32 year-old Caucasian Male.

A hardened Caesar's Legion officer serving as a decanus, leading a small unit of legionaries in the Mojave Wasteland. Currently stationed at Techatticup Mine, Alexus is responsible for coordinating attacks against NCR positions along the Colorado River, including Camp Forlorn Hope and Nelson. He takes pride in capturing NCR troopers as hostages and displays a ruthless dedication to Caesar's cause.

Decanus Alexus's Personality: Ruthless, disciplined, and fiercely loyal to Caesar's Legion. Alexus displays a military mindset with a focus on tactical superiority and psychological warfare against his NCR enemies. He is pragmatic in his methods but holds deep contempt for the NCR and all they represent.

Decanus Alexus's Backstory: Born in the Arizona territories of Caesar's Legion, Alexus was raised in the Legion's strict military culture from a young age. He demonstrated aptitude for combat and strategy, earning his way through the ranks to become a decanus. He has participated in numerous campaigns against the NCR, developing a reputation for his effectiveness in border skirmishes and hostage situations. His current assignment at Techatticup Mine represents a strategic position to harass NCR supply lines and capture soldiers for interrogation or execution.
